verses.verse: בַּיּ֣וֹם <WH3117> On that day הַה֗וּא <WH1931> they נִקְרָ֛א <WH7121> they read בְּסֵ֥פֶר <WH5612> in the book מֹשֶׁ֖ה <WH4872> of Moses בְּאָזְנֵ֣י <WH241> in the audience הָעָ֑ם <WH5971> of the people וְנִמְצָא֙ <WH4672> and therein was found כָּת֣וּב <WH3789> written בּ֔וֹ אֲ֠שֶׁר <WH834> ti לֹא־ <WH3808> no יָב֨וֹא <WH935> should not come עַמֹּנִ֧י <WH5984> that the Ammonite וּמֹאָבִ֛י <WH4125> and the Moabite בִּקְהַ֥ל <WH6951> into the congregation הָאֱלֹהִ֖ים <WH430> of God עַד־ <WH5704> for עוֹלָֽם׃ <WH5769> ever

כִּ֣י <WH3588> because לֹ֧א <WH3808> did not קִדְּמ֛וּ <WH6923> Because they met אֶת־ <WH853> בְּנֵ֥י <WH1121> not the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <WH3478> of Israel בַּלֶּ֣חֶם <WH3899> with bread וּבַמָּ֑יִם <WH4325> and with water וַיִּשְׂכֹּ֨ר <WH7936> but hired עָלָ֤יו <WH5921> against אֶת־ <WH853> בִּלְעָם֙ <WH1109> Balaam לְקַֽלְל֔וֹ <WH7043> against them that he should curse וַיַּהֲפֹ֧ךְ <WH2015> turned אֱלֹהֵ֛ינוּ <WH430> them howbeit our God הַקְּלָלָ֖ה <WH7045> the curse לִבְרָכָֽה׃ <WH1293> into a blessing

וַיְהִ֖י <WH1961> become כְּשָׁמְעָ֣ם <WH8085> Now it came to pass when they had heard אֶת־ <WH853> הַתּוֹרָ֑ה <WH8451> the law וַיַּבְדִּ֥ילוּ <WH914> that they separated כָל־ <WH3605> all עֵ֖רֶב <WH6154> all the mixed multitude מִיִּשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <WH3478> from Israel

וְלִפְנֵ֣י <WH6440> And before מִזֶּ֔ה <WH2088> to this אֶלְיָשִׁיב֙ <WH475> this Eliashib הַכֹּהֵ֔ן <WH3548> the priest נָת֖וּן <WH5414> having the oversight בְּלִשְׁכַּ֣ת <WH3957> of the chamber בֵּית־ <WH1004> of the house אֱלֹהֵ֑ינוּ <WH430> of our God קָר֖וֹב <WH7138> [was] allied לְטוֹבִיָּֽה׃ <WH2900> unto Tobiah

וַיַּ֨עַשׂ <WH6213> And he had prepared ל֜וֹ לִשְׁכָּ֣ה <WH3957> chamber גְדוֹלָ֗ה <WH1419> for him a great וְשָׁ֣ם <WH8033> where הָי֪וּ <WH1961> become לְפָנִ֟ים <WH6440> where aforetime נֹ֠תְנִים <WH5414> they laid אֶת־ <WH853> הַמִּנְחָ֨ה <WH4503> the meat offerings הַלְּבוֹנָ֜ה <WH3828> the frankincense וְהַכֵּלִ֗ים <WH3627> and the vessels וּמַעְשַׂ֤ר <WH4643> and the tithes הַדָּגָן֙ <WH1715> of the corn הַתִּיר֣וֹשׁ <WH8492> the new wine וְהַיִּצְהָ֔ר <WH3323> and the oil מִצְוַת֙ <WH4687> which was commanded הַלְוִיִּ֔ם <WH3881> [to be given] to the Levites וְהַמְשֹׁרְרִ֖ים <WH7891> and the singers וְהַשֹּׁעֲרִ֑ים <WH7778> and the porters וּתְרוּמַ֖ת <WH8641> and the offerings הַכֹּהֲנִֽים׃ <WH3548> of the priests

וּבְכָל־ <WH3605> all זֶ֕ה <WH2088> this לֹ֥א <WH3808> not הָיִ֖יתִי <WH1961> become בִּֽירוּשָׁלִָ֑ם <WH3389> But in all this [time] was not I at Jerusalem כִּ֡י <WH3588> for בִּשְׁנַת֩ <WH8141> year שְׁלֹשִׁ֨ים <WH7970> and thirtieth וּשְׁתַּ֜יִם <WH8147> for in the two לְאַרְתַּחְשַׁ֤סְתְּא <WH783> of Artaxerxes מֶֽלֶךְ־ <WH4428> king בָּבֶל֙ <WH894> of Babylon בָּ֣אתִי <WH935> came אֶל־ <WH413> to הַמֶּ֔לֶךְ <WH4428> I unto the king וּלְקֵ֥ץ <WH7093> and after יָמִ֖ים <WH3117> certain days נִשְׁאַ֥לְתִּי <WH7592> obtained I leave מִן־ <WH4480> from הַמֶּֽלֶךְ׃ <WH4428> of the king

וָאָב֖וֹא <WH935> And I came לִֽירוּשָׁלִָ֑ם <WH3389> to Jerusalem וָאָבִ֣ינָה <WH995> and understood בָרָעָ֗ה <WH7451> of the evil אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> after עָשָׂ֤ה <WH6213> did אֶלְיָשִׁיב֙ <WH475> that Eliashib לְט֣וֹבִיָּ֔ה <WH2900> for Tobiah לַעֲשׂ֥וֹת <WH6213> in preparing לוֹ֙ נִשְׁכָּ֔ה <WH5393> him a chamber בְּחַצְרֵ֖י <WH2691> in the courts בֵּ֥ית <WH1004> of the house הָאֱלֹהִֽים׃ <WH430> of God

וַיֵּ֥רַֽע <WH7489> displeasing לִ֖י מְאֹ֑ד <WH3966> me sore וָֽאַשְׁלִ֜יכָה <WH7993> therefore I cast forth אֶֽת־ <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> all כְּלֵ֧י <WH3627> stuff בֵית־ <WH1004> all the household טוֹבִיָּ֛ה <WH2900> of Tobiah הַח֖וּץ <WH2351> out of מִן־ <WH4480> out הַלִּשְׁכָּֽה׃ <WH3957> the chamber

וָאֹ֣מְרָ֔ה <WH559> Then I commanded וַֽיְטַהֲר֖וּ <WH2891> and they cleansed הַלְּשָׁכ֑וֹת <WH3957> the chambers וָאָשִׁ֣יבָה <WH7725> and thither brought I again שָּׁ֗ם <WH8033> there כְּלֵי֙ <WH3627> the vessels בֵּ֣ית <WH1004> of the house הָאֱלֹהִ֔ים <WH430> of God אֶת־ <WH854> for הַמִּנְחָ֖ה <WH4503> with the meat offering וְהַלְּבוֹנָֽה׃ <WH3828> and the frankincense פ

וָאֵ֣דְעָ֔ה <WH3045> And I perceived כִּֽי־ <WH3588> that מְנָי֥וֹת <WH4521> that the portions הַלְוִיִּ֖ם <WH3881> of the Levites לֹ֣א <WH3808> had not נִתָּ֑נָה <WH5414> had not been given וַיִּבְרְח֧וּ <WH1272> were fled אִישׁ־ <WH376> every one לְשָׂדֵ֛הוּ <WH7704> to his field הַלְוִיִּ֥ם <WH3881> [them] for the Levites וְהַמְשֹׁרְרִ֖ים <WH7891> and the singers עֹשֵׂ֥י <WH6213> that did הַמְּלָאכָֽה׃ <WH4399> the work

וָאָרִ֙יבָה֙ <WH7378> Then contended אֶת־ <WH854> for הַסְּגָנִ֔ים <WH5461> I with the rulers וָאֹ֣מְרָ֔ה <WH559> and said מַדּ֖וּעַ <WH4069> Why נֶעֱזַ֣ב <WH5800> forsaken בֵּית־ <WH1004> Why is the house הָאֱלֹהִ֑ים <WH430> of God וָֽאֶ֨קְבְּצֵ֔ם <WH6908> ? And I gathered them together וָֽאַעֲמִדֵ֖ם <WH5975> and set עַל־ <WH5921> and עָמְדָֽם׃ <WH5977> them in their place

וְכָל־ <WH3605> All יְהוּדָ֗ה <WH3063> all Judah הֵבִ֜יאוּ <WH935> Then brought מַעְשַׂ֧ר <WH4643> the tithe הַדָּגָ֛ן <WH1715> of the corn וְהַתִּיר֥וֹשׁ <WH8492> and the new wine וְהַיִּצְהָ֖ר <WH3323> and the oil לָאוֹצָרֽוֹת׃ <WH214> unto the treasuries

וָאוֹצְרָ֣ה <WH686> And I made treasurers עַל־ <WH5921> charge א֠וֹצָרוֹת <WH214> over the treasuries שֶׁלֶמְיָ֨ה <WH8018> Shelemiah הַכֹּהֵ֜ן <WH3548> the priest וְצָד֣וֹק <WH6659> and Zadok הַסּוֹפֵ֗ר <WH5608> the scribe וּפְדָיָה֙ <WH6305> Pedaiah מִן־ <WH4480> at הַלְוִיִּ֔ם <WH3881> and of the Levites וְעַל־ <WH5921> and it was their task יָדָ֔ם <WH3027> and next to them חָנָ֥ן <WH2605> [was] Hanan בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son זַכּ֖וּר <WH2139> of Zaccur בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son מַתַּנְיָ֑ה <WH4983> of Mattaniah כִּ֤י <WH3588> for נֶאֱמָנִים֙ <WH539> faithful נֶחְשָׁ֔בוּ <WH2803> for they were counted וַעֲלֵיהֶ֖ם <WH5921> charge לַחֲלֹ֥ק <WH2505> and their office [was] to distribute לַאֲחֵיהֶֽם׃ <WH251> unto their brethren פ

זָכְרָה־ <WH2142> Remember לִּ֥י אֱלֹהַ֖י <WH430> me O my God עַל־ <WH5921> and זֹ֑את <WH2063> and do וְאַל־ <WH408> not תֶּ֣מַח <WH4229> concerning this and wipe not out חֲסָדַ֗י <WH2617> my good אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> which עָשִׂ֛יתִי <WH6213> deeds that I have done בְּבֵ֥ית <WH1004> for the house אֱלֹהַ֖י <WH430> of my God וּבְמִשְׁמָרָֽיו׃ <WH4929> and for the offices

בַּיָּמִ֣ים <WH3117> In those days הָהֵ֡מָּה <WH1992> those רָאִ֣יתִי <WH7200> saw בִֽיהוּדָ֣ה ׀ <WH3063> I in Judah דֹּֽרְכִֽים־ <WH1869> [some] treading גִּתּ֣וֹת ׀ <WH1660> wine presses בַּשַּׁבָּ֡ת <WH7676> on the sabbath וּמְבִיאִ֣ים <WH935> and bringing in הָעֲרֵמ֣וֹת <WH6194> sheaves וְֽעֹמְסִ֪ים <WH6006> and lading עַל־ <WH5921> on הַחֲמֹרִ֟ים <WH2543> asses וְאַף־ <WH637> well יַ֜יִן <WH3196> as also wine עֲנָבִ֤ים <WH6025> grapes וּתְאֵנִים֙ <WH8384> and figs וְכָל־ <WH3605> and all מַשָּׂ֔א <WH4853> and all [manner of] burdens וּמְבִיאִ֥ים <WH935> which they brought יְרוּשָׁלִַ֖ם <WH3389> into Jerusalem בְּי֣וֹם <WH3117> day הַשַּׁבָּ֑ת <WH7676> on the sabbath וָאָעִ֕יד <WH5749> and I testified בְּי֖וֹם <WH3117> [against them] in the day מִכְרָ֥ם <WH4376> wherein they sold צָֽיִד׃ <WH6718> victuals

וְהַצֹּרִים֙ <WH6876> men of Tyre יָ֣שְׁבוּ <WH3427> There dwelt בָ֔הּ מְבִיאִ֥ים <WH935> also therein which brought דָּ֖אג <WH1709> fish וְכָל־ <WH3605> and all מֶ֑כֶר <WH4377> and all manner of ware וּמֹכְרִ֧ים <WH4376> and sold בַּשַּׁבָּ֛ת <WH7676> on the sabbath לִבְנֵ֥י <WH1121> unto the children יְהוּדָ֖ה <WH3063> of Judah וּבִירוּשָׁלִָֽם׃ <WH3389> and in Jerusalem

וָאָרִ֕יבָה <WH7378> Then I contended אֵ֖ת <WH854> for חֹרֵ֣י <WH2715> with the nobles יְהוּדָ֑ה <WH3063> of Judah וָאֹמְרָ֣ה <WH559> and said לָהֶ֗ם מָֽה־ <WH4100> What הַדָּבָ֨ר <WH1697> thing הָרָ֤ע <WH7451> unto them What evil הַזֶּה֙ <WH2088> is this אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> after אַתֶּ֣ם <WH859> you עֹשִׂ֔ים <WH6213> [is] this that ye do וּֽמְחַלְּלִ֖ים <WH2490> and profane אֶת־ <WH853> י֥וֹם <WH3117> age הַשַּׁבָּֽת׃ <WH7676> the sabbath

הֲל֨וֹא <WH3808> not כֹ֤ה <WH3541> the same עָשׂוּ֙ <WH6213> Did אֲבֹ֣תֵיכֶ֔ם <WH1> not your fathers וַיָּבֵ֨א <WH935> bring אֱלֹהֵ֜ינוּ <WH430> not our God עָלֵ֗ינוּ <WH5921> and אֵ֚ת <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> all הָרָעָ֣ה <WH7451> all this evil הַזֹּ֔את <WH2063> likewise וְעַ֖ל <WH5921> and הָעִ֣יר <WH5892> city הַזֹּ֑את <WH2063> likewise וְאַתֶּ֞ם <WH859> you מוֹסִיפִ֤ים <WH935> brought חָרוֹן֙ <WH2740> wrath עַל־ <WH5921> on יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> upon Israel לְחַלֵּ֖ל <WH2490> by profaning אֶת־ <WH853> הַשַּׁבָּֽת׃ <WH7676> the sabbath פ

וַיְהִ֡י <WH1961> came כַּאֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> it צָֽלֲלוּ֩ <WH6751> began to be dark שַׁעֲרֵ֨י <WH8179> And it came to pass that when the gates יְרוּשָׁלִַ֜ם <WH3389> of Jerusalem לִפְנֵ֣י <WH6440> before הַשַּׁבָּ֗ת <WH7676> the sabbath וָאֹֽמְרָה֙ <WH559> I commanded וַיִּסָּגְר֣וּ <WH5462> should be shut הַדְּלָת֔וֹת <WH1817> that the gates וָאֹ֣מְרָ֔ה <WH559> and charged אֲשֶׁר֙ <WH834> that לֹ֣א <WH3808> no יִפְתָּח֔וּם <WH6605> that they should not be opened עַ֖ד <WH5704> until אַחַ֣ר <WH310> till after הַשַּׁבָּ֑ת <WH7676> the sabbath וּמִנְּעָרַ֗י <WH5288> and [some] of my servants הֶֽעֱמַ֙דְתִּי֙ <WH5975> set עַל־ <WH5921> at הַשְּׁעָרִ֔ים <WH8179> I at the gates לֹא־ <WH3808> no יָב֥וֹא <WH935> be brought in מַשָּׂ֖א <WH4853> [that] there should no burden בְּי֥וֹם <WH3117> day הַשַּׁבָּֽת׃ <WH7676> on the sabbath

וַיָּלִ֨ינוּ <WH3885> lodged הָרֹכְלִ֜ים <WH7402> So the merchants וּמֹכְרֵ֧י <WH4376> and sellers כָל־ <WH3605> of every מִמְכָּ֛ר <WH4465> of all kind of ware מִח֥וּץ <WH2351> without לִירוּשָׁלִָ֖ם <WH3389> Jerusalem פַּ֥עַם <WH6471> once וּשְׁתָּֽיִם׃ <WH8147> or twice

וָאָעִ֣ידָה <WH5749> Then I testified בָהֶ֗ם וָאֹמְרָ֤ה <WH559> against them and said אֲלֵיהֶם֙ <WH413> to מַדּ֜וּעַ <WH4069> Why אַתֶּ֤ם <WH859> you לֵנִים֙ <WH3885> unto them Why lodge נֶ֣גֶד <WH5048> ye about הַחוֹמָ֔ה <WH2346> wall אִם־ <WH518> lo תִּשְׁנ֕וּ <WH8138> do יָ֖ד <WH3027> hands אֶשְׁלַ֣ח <WH7971> I will lay בָּכֶ֑ם מִן־ <WH4480> that הָעֵ֣ת <WH6256> on you From that time הַהִ֔יא <WH1931> he לֹא־ <WH3808> did not בָ֖אוּ <WH935> forth came בַּשַּׁבָּֽת׃ <WH7676> they no [more] on the sabbath ס

וָאֹמְרָ֣ה <WH559> And I commanded לַלְוִיִּ֗ם <WH3881> the Levites אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> after יִֽהְי֤וּ <WH1961> should מִֽטַּהֲרִים֙ <WH2891> that they should cleanse וּבָאִים֙ <WH935> themselves and [that] they should come שֹׁמְרִ֣ים <WH8104> [and] keep הַשְּׁעָרִ֔ים <WH8179> the gates לְקַדֵּ֖שׁ <WH6942> to sanctify אֶת־ <WH853> י֣וֹם <WH3117> day הַשַּׁבָּ֑ת <WH7676> the sabbath גַּם־ <WH1571> also זֹאת֙ <WH2063> likewise זָכְרָה־ <WH2142> Remember לִּ֣י אֱלֹהַ֔י <WH430> me O my God וְח֥וּסָה <WH2347> [concerning] this also and spare עָלַ֖י <WH5921> on כְּרֹ֥ב <WH7230> me according to the greatness חַסְדֶּֽךָ׃ <WH2617> of thy mercy פ

גַּ֣ם ׀ <WH1571> also בַּיָּמִ֣ים <WH3117> In those days הָהֵ֗ם <WH1992> those רָאִ֤יתִי <WH7200> also saw אֶת־ <WH853> הַיְּהוּדִים֙ <WH3064> I Jews הֹשִׁ֗יבוּ <WH3427> [that] had married נָשִׁים֙ <WH802> wives [אַשְׁדֹּודִיֹּות כ] (אַשְׁדֳּדִיֹּ֔ות <WH796> Ashdodites ק) [עַמֹּונִיֹּות כ] (עַמֳּנִיֹּ֖ות <WH5984> Ammonite ק) מוֹאֲבִיּֽוֹת׃ <WH4125> [and] of Moab

וּבְנֵיהֶ֗ם <WH1121> And their children חֲצִי֙ <WH2677> half מְדַבֵּ֣ר <WH1696> spake אַשְׁדּוֹדִ֔ית <WH797> in the speech of Ashdod וְאֵינָ֥ם <WH369> and none מַכִּירִ֖ים <WH5234> and could לְדַבֵּ֣ר <WH1696> not speak יְהוּדִ֑ית <WH3066> in the Jews' language וְכִלְשׁ֖וֹן <WH3956> but according to the language עַ֥ם <WH5971> of each וָעָֽם׃ <WH5971> people
